changeSet.author: WeiChen
changeSet.sql: create table nhi_ic_card_operation_record ( id bigint not null constraint pk_nhi_ic_card_operation_record primary key, disposal_id bigint, operation varchar, nhi_date_time varchar, nhi_response_code varchar, nhi_response_message varchar, days varchar, delivery_prescription_note varchar, medical_order_category varchar, medical_item_code varchar, medical_part varchar, total varchar, usage varchar, created_by varchar(50), created_date timestamp, last_modified_by varchar(50), last_modified_date timestamp );
